tours.name: 4 Days Phu Quoc - Hon Thom - 6 Destinations
tours.description: Discover the paradise island of Phu Quoc with stunning beaches, vibrant markets, and natural beauty. Take the cable car to Hon Thom Island and explore 6 must-visit destinations including Sunset Town, Phu Quoc Prison, and Sao Beach.

itinerary.title: Phu Quoc Arrival
itinerary.content:
Check in hotel
And spend the day freely exploring its stunning beaches, vibrant markets, and natural beauty at your own pace.

itinerary.title: 4 Island + Hon Thom
itinerary.content:
08:00-09:00: Pick up from your hotel and transfer to Anh Duong Cable Car Station (located in Sunset Town)
09:15: Board the cable car and enjoy a scenic ride to Hon Thom Island
Have fun at Aquatopia Water Park and Exotica Theme Park with unlimited access to thrilling rides and slides. Enjoy a lunch buffet at a restaurant on Hon Thom Island.
16:30-17:00: Take the cable car back to Anh Duong Cable Car Station.
Visit the iconic Kiss Bridge Phu Quoc, a must-see attraction.

itinerary.title: 6 Destination Tour
itinerary.content:
(For the best experience, the schedule may be changed)
09:00 The car picks you up at hotel/resort
Vinpearl – 8:00
Ong Lang Beach – 8:20
Duong Dong – 8:40
Truong Beach – 9:30
10:00 Start the tour of 6 most attractive land spots in Phu Quoc

SUNSET TOWN
(Check-in Cable car station, Roman Arena)

PHU QUOC PRISON
(Visit historical site of Phu Quoc)

FISH SAUCE FACTORY
(Learn about the production process of Phu Quoc fish sauce specialties)

SAO BEACH
(Have lunch, swim and rest)

HO QUOC PAGODA
(Visit the largest temple in Phu Quoc)

SUNSET SANATO
(One of the best places for checking-in and enjoying sunset)

17:00 The car takes you back to your hotel/resort

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.content:
Hotel Breakfast
Check out from the hotel and board your transfer to the airport

seo.title: 4 Days Phu Quoc - Hon Thom Island - 6 Destinations Tour | TaHa Travel
seo.description: Explore Phu Quoc's paradise beaches and attractions. Cable car to Hon Thom Island, Aquatopia Water Park, Sao Beach, Ho Quoc Pagoda, and Sunset Town.
seo.keywords: phu quoc tour, hon thom island, cable car phu quoc, sao beach, sunset town, phu quoc prison, vietnam island tour

tours.name: 5 Days Phu Quoc - Hon Thom - 6 Destinations - VinWonders - Grand World
tours.description: Ultimate Phu Quoc experience with Hon Thom Island cable car, 6 must-visit destinations, VinWonders Theme Park - the biggest in Vietnam, and the sleepless city Grand World with spectacular shows and entertainment.

itinerary.title: VinWonders + Grand World
itinerary.content:
Shuttle car picks you up at hotel/resort
Have fun at VinWonders – The biggest Theme Park in VietNam

Thrilling games, Water Park, Castle, Fairy Tales Garden, Viking's Village, Aquarium - watching show "The Love Story's Mermaid"
Have lunch at restaurant

Visit "Sleepless City" - Grand World

Discover artistic highlight Bamboo Legend
Enjoy Vietnamese Essence Show (not expenses included)
Have Bun Quay - specialty food in Phu Quoc

Enjoy lively atmosphere at night with "The Colors of Venice"

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.content:
Hotel Breakfast
Check out from the hotel and board your transfer to the airport

seo.title: 5 Days Phu Quoc - VinWonders - Grand World - Hon Thom | TaHa Travel
seo.description: Complete Phu Quoc experience with Hon Thom cable car, 6 destinations, VinWonders Theme Park, and Grand World's spectacular shows. Explore Vietnam's island paradise.
seo.keywords: phu quoc vinwonders, grand world phu quoc, hon thom cable car, phu quoc 5 days, vietnam theme park, sao beach phu quoc

tours.name: 6 Days Phu Quoc - Hon Thom - VinWonders - Grand World - Southern Tour
tours.description: The most comprehensive Phu Quoc tour package. Experience Hon Thom Island, 6 iconic destinations, VinWonders Theme Park, Grand World entertainment, and a complete Southern Island tour including Pearl Farm, Sim Wine Factory, and Pepper Farm.

itinerary.title: Sightseeing the Southern
itinerary.content:
08:00 Pick-up from your hotel or nearest pickup point
09:00 Begin your island journey!
Pearl Farm and showroom
Sim Wine Factory & Showroom
Pepper Farm
Fish Sauce Production House
Ho Quoc Pagoda & Coconut Prison (War Museum)
Sao Beach: Enjoy lunch, relax, swim, and sunbath
15:30 – Check in and take photos at Sunset Town. Experience the Kiss Bridge (extra cost)
16:30 – Drop-off at your hotel & end of tour
Optional: On your way back, you may visit Sunset Sanato, Oc Sen Beach Bar, Sunset Beach Bar, or the Night Market (entry tickets not included & return transfer at own expense)

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.content:
Hotel Breakfast
Check out from the hotel and board your transfer to the airport

seo.title: 6 Days Phu Quoc Complete Tour - VinWonders - Grand World - Southern Island | TaHa Travel
seo.description: Ultimate 6-day Phu Quoc adventure. Hon Thom cable car, VinWonders, Grand World, Southern Island tour with Pearl Farm, Sim Wine, Pepper Farm. Complete island experience.
seo.keywords: phu quoc 6 days, vinwonders phu quoc, grand world, southern island tour, pearl farm phu quoc, sim wine, pepper farm, vietnam island vacation
